content.html: Having syntax memorized doesn’t prove you’re smarter than anyone. It’s a cool trick that implies your memory works well for a type of recollection. That’s not a knock to someone in either category. But please don’t use it as justification of brilliance or even experience.
content.value:
Having syntax memorized doesn’t prove you’re smarter than anyone.

It’s a cool trick that implies your memory works well for a type of recollection.

That’s not a knock to someone in either category.

But please don’t use it as justification of brilliance or even experience.
